name: Marauders map
description: Shows location of everyone inside of Hogwarts

name: Portkey
description: Allows person to teleport to wanted location. Portkey will be destroyed.

name: Secrecy sensor
description: Detects concealments and lies. When used before adventure highers the chance to find something

name: Sack of floo powder
description: Allows person to teleport to wanted location. Uses it

name: Time-turner
description: Can be used to double the speed of studying or practicing.

name: Cauldron
description: Can be used to make potions. Automatically uses the best owned cauldon for brewing

name: Old shoes
description: Keeps users feet dry...most of the time

name: Teapot
description: Makes warm water with some flavor
